website_summaries.verdict: Works like magic to cool down large dogs, especially those with heavy coats.
pros: Multi-purpose cooling mat for indoor and outdoor use
Safe for dogs, kids, adults, and other animals
cons: May not be good on wood floors due to slickness of material
Not good for dogs with mobility issues

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: After my dog had been on it twice the cover split open from getting in and out of the car. My dog is not a digger or a chewer. Material ripped in three different places from normal use. Update: The company was very helpful and sent a new mat right away, no questions asked. The new mat is working fine. I encourage the company to consider a more durable cover for the cooling gel. JD.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: It did not even last 5 months.
customer_reviews.text: It did not even last five months. The other cool bads I have tried like cool bed III and canine cooler lasted over a year. When I contacted the company about the warranty, I was told I would have to pay return shipping and then they might fix it or replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Barker

customer_reviews.title: Not durable if you have a dog
customer_reviews.text: Well, 2 dog scratches and the mat ripped to the gel. So, durability is most questionable if your dog wants to scratch it first thing like they would on a normal mat or bed. Comfort...it is very flat so I have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: lakeviews

customer_reviews.title: Max likes it
customer_reviews.text: It is noticibly cooler than room temperature. My dog won't lay on any kind of bed if the temperature is above 70. This may gets him up off the floor and cools him down. The mat folds up nice and compact for travel or storage and it the material is very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: It ripped
customer_reviews.text: So I got this cooling pad for my dog and it lasted for like 2 months before it ripped. This cooling pad has been sitting in the same spot never moved and my dog would lay on it a couple times a week for an hour or 2 and it already ripped. I wrote the seller an email about this as well and not even a reply. Bad costumer service as well as very bad product I do not recommend this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I bought it for my fiancée to put under the bedsheets. It works wonderfull it cools him down when we go to sleep and doesn't affect me. This way we can turn the air conditioner off at night. We love it and think it's one of the best things we got for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Reinhard

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality- tears easily
customer_reviews.text: After reading many positive reviews about large breed dogs enjoying this indoor cooling mat, I was hopeful that my German Shepherd would love it as well. He took to it very well, laying on it during the daytime & night time hours for 1 and a half weeks. After only 1 and a half weeks we noticed it had a huge tear in it, & fluid was seeping out of it. Keep in mind, we keep our Shepherd's nails well trimmed & he is not a chewer. I am hugely disappointed in the quality (or lack there of) of this product & would not recommend it to other potential buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dogs don’t seem to like them and one is already torn from the dog’s nail.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: second purchase of this brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought a smaller version last year on a charity purchase. I didn't really believe this would work well. I was wrong. It works really well. I liked it so much I bought the large size this year for use in my campervan this summer. It not only cools the dogs but me too. I haven't actually used this one but it is the exact same brand as the one I bought last year and other than being bigger is exactly the same therefore I expect it to function just as well. It folds up for easy storage when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CRN

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is AMAZING!! My dog gets hot and even with the central air on after a walk he still needs extra cooling down. This mat works fast and is super comfortable!! I even use it when I’m working out to cool myself down and the cushion on it is so nice. It’s big too because my pooch always lays next to me when I’m working out and we are both able to fit on the mat together. Love love love!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Needs a more durable cover!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a French mastiff and he gets overheated quickly so I read the reviews and ordered this mat. It arrived and I immediately put it in the back of my van for a road trip. The blue outside cover of the mat was punctured after the first hour...... We arrived at our destination so I flipped the pad on the other side and put it on the kitchen floor but by the next morning it had a tare in it..... The mat stays nice and cool. The reviews said the mat cover didn't tare as easy as other brands. The cover is extremely easy to rip! Very disappointing 😢
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It does cool and it's big. But it's to thin for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty thin. It does cool so no argument there. We had a water filled one that finally leaked. The water ones can leak after awhile but provide much more cushion. I have a BIG Retriever. He loves the cool mats. I returned it as I just wanted more cushion. You could probably put this on another cushion and accomplish what I needed. It is big. I would think it's perfect for travel as it folds up easily. Just not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: whobdis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the lack of durability.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this mat as it helps her cool off quite easily. However, I was quite disappointed at the durability of this product. Within the first week there is cuts in it. I assume from her nails but we keep then short and rounded so they don't scratch. All she does is walk on it to lay down and get back up but there is new cuts in all the time. Very disappointing. I bought because of the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Barron

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this Pet Cooling mat.
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for less than a month, but it was welcomed immediately by our aging Lab! It is easy to clean, no punctures so far. I did raise it up and put it on the 2 Buddy Beds we have for our pack of aging lovies. Very strong, very cooling - I wish they made this Woman sized for this Georgia heat! Buddy Dude comes in from his walk and prompted self-cools on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog LOVES his new cooling mat
customer_reviews.text: I have a behemoth black lab here in Texas where the sun is melting the earth, so my dog tries to stay cool however possible. Up until this new mat arriving, his favorite cooling spot is just some open spot on the hardwood floor. Now with this mat, it is his go-to cooling spot. It appears to work as described and is very durable. I: have not had to clean it yet, but it seems like it will be a snap to clean. Anything my dog loves, I love it too! And he really does love this new cooling mat! Wish I would've seen these sooner. :)
customer_reviews.author: casey r rogers

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as other brands
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a few of these dog cooling mats to use in different areas of my home for my pup to use in the Texas heat. I purchased this one because of the size, much bigger than others I’ve ordered but the cooling gel inside doesn’t seem as thick and therefore isn’t as effective at cooling as all the others I have purchased and cooling effect doesn’t last as long. This one is fine but when I’m in the market for another I will be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you can’t obtain the protective cover
customer_reviews.text: It took less than two weeks for a 4 month old Newfoundland puppy to rip this to shreds. He loved it and misses it, but it is not durable, nor is it safe for him when he was able to rip out the gel from inside the pad. It was quite expensive and would have been great for a dog who is hot blooded but it will have to go in the trash. Heads up to anyone ordering... there is a cover you can buy to protect this pad, however they are “out of stock” from the manufacturer with no word on if they will ever be back in stock. Don’t buy if you can not obtain a cover first.
customer_reviews.author: BirdieL

customer_reviews.title: Cracks occurred within a month's time
customer_reviews.text: While the size and cooling aspects of this product were great, I was very disappointed that two cracks occurred with normal usage in a month's time. Also, I was going to request to send it back for replacement, but I was four days out of the allowable range for return. I am very disappointed that this will not be made right. It's even more distressing because I waited a bit before putting it out for the dogs' to use.
customer_reviews.author: DestinyLAF

customer_reviews.title: Golden Not Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My Golden did not approve. I had to send it back. Material didnt feel as strong as I had hoped for which is why I had to order the cover for it. The cover does add a layer of protection but it also takes away a good amount of cooling action from the mat. Price does not justify this product.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto I.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first now is useless
customer_reviews.text: I have a German Shepherd who needed this badly at night to keep cool. At first it was perfect and when I stepped on it, it was very cool on my feet. My dog loved it! After just a few months, it no longer stays cold and does not seem to be as heavy so the gel dissipated but thankfully I do not see a leak onto my carpet. I expected for $75+ dollars for it to last longer than it did. I am so sad and disappointed in this product but not as much as my big dog is on these now hotter days!
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you cool all night!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must, if you like to sleep cool at night. My A/C was blowing hot air one night when it was 113 degrees outside and inside was almost 90 degrees. This mat is the only thing that saved me from going to a hotel for the night. It keeps you cool and comfortable and a floor fan helped too. Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.author: Taffy M.

customer_reviews.title: Not One Inch Thick as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This may or may not provide cooling, but it sure does not provide any cushioning for my dog's aching joints. This is about half as thick as the stated 1" thickness. He objects to the material, or the smell or something. I tried all the tricks to get him to lie down on it, but he is just not interested. And why does it have to be this hideous blue color? Yes, I knew it was blue before I bought it, but there aren't any others that are not blue. I am returning this because my dog will not use it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieInAcworth

customer_reviews.title: I’ve purchased 2 now
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd mat I bought. First one was for a long haired American Eskimo. This one is bigger and for my 4 mo old St Bernard puppy. He was sleeping in the kitchen on the tile and now he sleeps on the mat in the living room with us. This mat is actually longer than the picture shows because my husband folded one end under so it would fit under a folding table he uses in front of his couch. I did put cardboard under the table legs so they don’t puncture the mat. As our puppy grows we will unfold the mat. I’m a big fan of these mats and they are great for keeping dogs cool!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This item is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Lab when she travels back and forth with me across the mountains during the summer months. In the back of my Kia Soul I have 2 thin dog bed mats from Costco and would place the cooling mat on top of those for my Lab to lay on during the trip. I purchased this at the beginning of August for $70 and by mid-September I noticed a tear in the cooling mat and pieces of gel ended up all over my car. For $70 this mat should be able to withstand my lab periodically changing position during the car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: No more panting during the night
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. We have a senior dog, 100 lbs. she is always hot. My husband said she would never use it. WRONG. We put it on her bed and after a few hours she would lay on it all the time. It's a little slick and, I read some people put a sheet over it. I thought she would get tangled in a sheet. Our dog is very old and has trouble getting around. She loved her cooling mat. It pays to get one from this sellar. Very well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S.

customer_reviews.title: Go for the solid gel filling
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I actually bought a second one since my dog loves it so much. This allows me to put another one on a different level of the house. Originally I bought one from another company that was liquid gel filled. That didn't last, and one little nail hole made a nasty mess everywhere. After some research, I found out these cooling mats also come in a solid gel version like this one from Arf Pets. Definitely a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.Top Contributor: Star Trek

customer_reviews.title: Cool's like a champ, but make sure to buy the cover
customer_reviews.text: My dogs can't get enough of this bed. Everyone is always fighting for a corner of it. People have reported it tearing or getting punctured by dog nails, which I can see, but make sure to buy the cover for it. That will alleviate some of the worry of it getting a hole. Also, having the cover makes it easier to clean; just throw the cover in the wash. Otherwise, this works great and keeps my pack, happy and cool.
customer_reviews.author: CrzRani

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Works as described. Would highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pickier dog, lab/hound mix 65lbs. She very much likes soft blankets and no problem laying on this and is her go to spot now!! She takes a few meds that make her warmer than normal. This has been amazing and her panting has decreased dramatically! We have the largest size and is more than perfect for her to stretch out and be all the way covered. Will be buying a second one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Torn

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it but needs to be sturdier
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs adore this mat but we are actually on our second one because it just isn’t sturdy enough for dog claws on it. Don’t think we will buy it again as it rips too easily with our two large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Callis

customer_reviews.title: If only it didn't rip so easily...it would be almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my older sick Newfie a few months ago to help him keep cool. He immediately loved and it worked fantastic keeping him from over heating. I only have one complaint hence the 4 stars rather than 5, it rips so easily. I wish they would make it out of more durable material to help prevent this. I only recently saw the mat cover and am going to try that to see if it will help to lengthen the life span. I also wish there was some cushion for him as well. Overall though, it did the job I needed it to do. Now I just need it to last longer than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: jconner

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 14 year old black lab. She is always hot and we've been having a very warm summer so she had been panting like crazy and was restless. I was skeptical of how good this would work but I though it was worth a try. I'm so glad we bought it! It only takes a few minutes after she lays down on it for the panting to stop and she sleeps well through the night. It is made of really durable material. She has thick nails that are usually fairly long and she hasn't punctured any holes in it and it wipes clean easily. I highly recommend this cooling mat!
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: Happy Rottie
customer_reviews.text: My Rotties hates sleeping on beds, and had always slept in his crate or on the floor. Since purchasing the cold mat he sleeps on it every night. I'm extremely happy he has something with cushion and cooling to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Surface is slick, but it folds
customer_reviews.text: I have an older giant mutt with typical large dog issues of getting up. She tried the mat right off, but needed help to get up as her feet kept sliding out from under her. I thought I might try getting the shower tread stickers, but decided to fold the mat in half lengthwise (easy to do the way it is made), which appears to be working. Her entire body fits full length but her legs hang off onto the rug. She can get up on her own and her belly gets the cooling benefit. Since that's what she needs, it's working. We've only had it a short time, so we'll see how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: sci-fi mom

customer_reviews.title: Saw a panting dog go from overheated to comfortable within 10 minutes of laying on this mat
customer_reviews.text: My 60 pound pit bull sleeps in the bed with me - but when it's above 75 in the room, the pillow-top mattress traps too much heat and he pants and pants and pants. Got this and at first I didn't use it, but one night when he was overheating and hot and panting, I pulled this out and dragged him onto it....he cooled down to NO PANTING within 10 minutes. It had that great of an effect. Now I catch him going upstairs to lay on it all the time. You really can't have too many of these.
customer_reviews.author: NY Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed! Icy cool! Beats the heat!
customer_reviews.text: This product is fabulous! I bought it for my granddog, a Colorado born Newfoundland who was visiting Texas in July. This mat was truly wonderful at helping her to survive our 100 degree temps. In addition, the first one I ordered was damaged and this great company sent a new one within days. I’m very impressed and would highly recommend this product & seller!
customer_reviews.author: TexasCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Meep
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a xl intended for when going out for meals and such with doggo.. The weight would have become tiring so I ordered a smaller size. The XL is perfect for on my couch so my double coated doggo is comfortable while I'm away at work. Only thing I'm disappointed in, the outline of this has frayed off and its falling apart. Didn't expect at the cost it would occur. Though it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Rips for no reason
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing for a few weeks. It really did cool my dog down which was incredibly helpful this summer. That being said it has developed several long rips in the mat and the gel is coming out. Most people will assume my dogs nails are too long and they just ripped the material but I swear I keep his nails trimmed and just living in the city the pavement keeps them worn down quite well. The mat just doesn't seem durable enough. Just hoping the gel is non-toxic.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M

customer_reviews.title: Not tear resistant
customer_reviews.text: Ripped within an hour. My dog was just going in circles and trying to get comfortable and there were 5 rips from her nails. It is NOT at all tear resistant. My own nail was able to make a tear. On the plus side, it IS cooling. Hoping if I just flip it over and duct tape the rips, it’ll still work.
customer_reviews.author: CadLadyKim

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: This mat cools exactly as described our Bernese Mountain dog will lay this and he never lays on anything but a tile floor . He has a bad set of knees and we got this to help them , seems to be of great value in that . Only problem I have is moving it as it is heavy I need assistance
customer_reviews.author: Al or Lydia

customer_reviews.title: After a month has a number of slits in fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Had about a month, god a large so dog could move around when one spot warmed up. Started noticing small slits in fabric, I now have a number of small and large slits where gel is exposed. Must be for declawed dogs as material did not hold up. Rather spendy for item that did not hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheber

customer_reviews.title: Kept our boy cool and helped everyone sleep better!
customer_reviews.text: This cooling bed really did the trick in helping keep my 13 year old Lab cool during one of the hottest summers we have had in a while. We put this on top of his orthopedic bed at night and he slept much better which meant that we did too! The only issue we had was that my large dog has regressed and thinks he is a pup again and he jumped and raked on it recently and shredded the material covering one small section. Thankfully it is sectioned off so it did not ruin the whole bed.
customer_reviews.author: shopper1

customer_reviews.title: Old English Sheepdog approved
customer_reviews.text: Got the large - I have a full coat old English sheepdog in Florida. We have a/c, but she typically sleeps on the cool tile wrapped around the toilet like a sorority girl on Friday night. 15 minutes out of the box this was charged up and she quickly got the idea. Easily large enough for her, and she is quite tall and weighs 100lbs. I may buy another for the bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Save your money...bought two, both tore within weeks
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this but tore SO easily. Initially purchased one back around May for our four month old Bernese mountain dog. He loves it but unfortunately it tears just from normal use (I.e. getting up to get water/eat, walking on it). His nails are trimmed and dull and he never digs at it (since the inside is toxic he uses with supervision). After the first fire, I ordered a second hoping we just got a faulty one. Unfortunately the second was worse, tearing in multiple places within two weeks. Overall would not recommend especially if you have a larger dog that may put more pressure on the cover due to its size.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Cool place to lie
customer_reviews.text: My lab loves how is cools him down. My border collie can't sit still long enough to use. When it gets really hot it's hard to use. It's easy to wipe clean. When you go to buy really look at the measurements. Large is very large! But we doubled it and it gave them more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Sflet

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these mats for my 2 saint bernards to lay on and cool off. They weigh about 166 lbs each and these mats probably only stayed cool for the first couple days. My dogs love them while they worked. Now I can sit on them and they don't get cool. Could be too much weight from my dogs. Easy to clean. And do work but my dogs might be too heavy for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this cooling mat for my Rottweiler about 4 times now in just as many years. He loves laying on his mat at night and will sleep on it through the entire night. I have been replacing it annually since it does tend to get ripped up with his nails eventually even though he never scratches at it nor is he particularly rough with it. The mat is easy to clean, I just use a wet rag to wipe it off every now and then. He loves it so I will continue to purchase it for him, definitely worth it for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product. Easy to clean and durable. It worked to keep my dog cool. My only problem was after the initial use, my dog didn't use it. After having her ignore it for a couple weeks I gave it to another dog owner. Her dog likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Mira E. Creed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gentle Giants!
customer_reviews.text: Our Bullmastiff is experiencing his first VA “summer” and was not handling it well. Five minutes of playing with the dog next door and he would pant like crazy! Decided to order this mat to use as cool down spot for him in the house and also for car rides. He loves it! He was heavily panting after his walk this evening so I put the mat down to try out. He LOVED it! He also stopped panting much quicker than it usually takes him! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kuwano

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the dogs cool, but does not stand up to normal wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooling may May 2nd. I was cleaning it today (July 12th) and I already noticed the tears in the pictures above. This mat is actually kept on our bed for the dogs to stay cool at night, and we fold it up and place it on our carpet during the day, so the tears are 100% from our dogs lying on it. I would expect something that costs this much to at least last a year before needing to be replaced...
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality covering
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with the quality of this cooling mat. My golden retriever has clipped nails, yet has popped holes in the cover of this very easily. Unfortunately this causes the substance inside to come out. I’m afraid to leave my dog alone with this because I don’t want her to eat the stuff that comes out. She’s not a chewer or a digger, and has no history of destroying anything else in my home. This was a $75 mistake. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Webster

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all! It’s already ripped from my dogs claws.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product 2 days and my dog has already ruined it. He was nesting and his claws ripped holes in it. The cooling gel is oozing out of the 4 tears. 70$ down the toilet. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: At first he was hesitant of what this was but since he got on it, he has loved it! It really works. My dog is sound asleep on it all the time now and doesn't wake up at all due to any sound or heat. Not only that but because he is immobile, if he has any accidents, it's super easy to clean up due to the material. 1pm and still asleep on it when he usually gets woken up or disturbed near 6am or so.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C.

customer_reviews.title: ripped in 4 days!
customer_reviews.text: Cooled well, but already ripped only after 4 days. Barely used only once a day since we got it. I put it outside on my deck today due to it being in the 80's and my lab only laid on it. when I picked it up to bring back inside it was ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping our old lab comfortable in the dog days of summer
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it for just a week and so far it’s great. Our old lab doesn’t like the heat so decided try this cooling mat. We received it on hottest day of year (95 + degree and 60 %+ humidity) . We placed on couch where he lays and he’s been so comfortable! Why didn’t I seek this out sooner? I opted for this product since safe if the younger labs decide to chew (🤞 they don’t ). I purchased the covering for the mat . So far I highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lessard-York

customer_reviews.title: It is super cooling!
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver this summer! We’ve had it now for a few weeks and our puppy loves it and gives her a chance to sleep in our bedroom at night. Of course I tested it myself and wish our gel mattress was as cooling as this one! So far it has survived her scratching and hasn’t thorn or shown any signs of compromise.
customer_reviews.author: Monika Petrova

customer_reviews.title: Good as long as it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My boy Ice loved this cooling pad. Key word, “loved”. As huskies do, he scratched right through this cooling pad. Customer service was fantastic. I spoke to a woman named ‘Sasha’ and she was incredible. After my boy scratched the cooling pad, they sent me a second one. The first one he scratched right through the first night! The second one lasted about two weeks. I won’t get another one, not because of the product, but because of my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Does what is says
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our Rotti - as we thought it would help cool him down quicker during the hot months. The size was perfect. I too laid on it and you could instantly start to feel the cooling. We also thought it might help with his arthritis. He was hesitant to lay on it at first because it was new to him - but he laid on it with us and seemed to like it. He's adjusting to something new - but as far as the product it definitely does what it states.
customer_reviews.author: wendy evans

customer_reviews.title: The mat really does cool your pet.
customer_reviews.text: My dog Midnite and Daisy the cat just love the mat. Midnite does not do well with the hot summers. She was having a hard time with temperatures in the 90s. This Mat has been a game changer. When she goes indoors she heads right to her mat to cool down.
customer_reviews.author: Nascar88

customer_reviews.title: Keep my dogs cool on hot days
customer_reviews.text: I have two pits and no ac. They love these on hot days! Keeps them cool for hours, and just flip over to “reset”. My husband has even used from time to time to cool him down (when he had a fever this winter he laid on this and helped him break his fever quicker than normal). Must have for a dog owner to ensure pups don’t overheat in hot weather
customer_reviews.author: Launa Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but must order cover seperate to protect
customer_reviews.text: The mat certainly helped my dog settle dog from being hot in both his crate and at night. Very large and fits my 130 lb bloodhound well. Only problem i had was that it ripped within the first day which was a disappointment for the price. Ordered a replacement and a cover to hopefully keep it better shielded. Order was replaced immediately and seller handled it wonderfully. Gteat customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Barthel

customer_reviews.title: Torn up easily from my puppy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat for my Rottweiler puppy to be cool in Costa Rica. But in one week he got a hole in there. Another few weeks he got a lot more holes in there. I can’t recommend this mat for chewing dogs. It cools fine though - But for the reason I bought it it’s way too expensive
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the biggest one so that all three of my dogs could get on it if needed. They spend most of their time on it which makes me believe that it is working for them. It is easy to clean and so far no tears or scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: This mat works extremely well and stays cool for hours
customer_reviews.text: This mat works extremely well and stays cool for hours. My german shepherd/husky is hot constantly, but he loves to cool off on this mat. My only complaint is that I wish the lining material was a little heavier duty. My dog was lightly chewing on the edges and they are now ripped up. Fortunately, the gel inside is compact, so he didn't come in contact with any of the actual gel. Just be careful if you have chewers.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Fleshman

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Big enough for a Newfie! This cool mat is perfect. Just what I was looking for. I've had it for a couple of months and it is easy to clean, and big enough for my 160 pound Newfoundland. He sleeps on it every night. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra S. Zemanek

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and comfortable pad!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this a couple of weeks now but love it so far! Very cool to the touch and seems to be made well. My Golden Retriever is 95 lbs and this was the biggest pad I could find. It’s huge! She can lay all sprawled out with plenty of extra room. She’s very hot natured and uses this every day.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Herald

customer_reviews.title: Great size for my St. Bernard & it keeps her cool
customer_reviews.text: My St. Bernard uses this mat every night at bedtime. She likes to lay on a floor instead of a dog bed. I don't want her to lay directly on a hard surface & this gives some cushion while keeping her cooler. She is a big girl but has plenty of room to fully lay out on this mat. I have it placed under the air vent so it keeps cooler longer. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: it took my dog a little while to get used to it, but when it started to get hot she started using it much more. So she does seem to appreciate the cooling factor and not just the fact that it's a cushion. I did get the cover and it makes it easy to vacuum like the rest of your floor
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: The best one out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd one. Love it! My pack loves it. They all want to lay on it. We have tried them all and this is ,without a doubt, the best one on the market. Totally Love Pack approved!
customer_reviews.author: Isa Garcia Farnham

customer_reviews.title: Not durable at all.  Everything is cheap and easily torn
customer_reviews.text: I received the pad on Friday, assembled (put cover on). Left the dog in crate with pad for less than 2 hours. When I returned the cover was shredded, the casing was ripped apart and gel had been turned into confetti. This pad should never be used for an active dog. I got less than 2 hours use of a $75 pad. I was terribly disappointed. Never going to do business with DBRoth again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Strawn

customer_reviews.title: Milly loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this in the summer when it got too hot! My dog is an avid chewer! (Shes a rottie) tennis balls last 5 seconds! And she didn’t even bother with this mat. Definitely worth the money! She slept way better rather than moving every 5 seconds to find the cold spot on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT durable. With in a couple of days out dog punctured it. Very disappointed. And the Price was definitely NOT worth it. We will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lark

customer_reviews.title: Easy for a chewer to find a corner and start ripping it into strips
customer_reviews.text: Dog got ahold of binding the second day and started ripping this thing apart. We have a bernedoodle and he is always hot but rarely chooses to lay on this mat. Seems to like the tile floor better. Will try it outside this summer if there is anything left of it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Cooling Pad is large good for big dogs or a few smaller dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog didn’t lay on it idk why? It’s much larger than my sister and my dog layer in hers? For me the one I got is heavy and large, I don’t know why my dog doesn’t lay on it? But it’s cool seems to work good, I have touched it. My dog is 65 pounds and it’s good size for a large dog or a few to lay on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs won't lay on it
customer_reviews.text: I have two great danes and a mutt. None of them will lay on the mat. They've played on it (i guess that's when it tore) and walked on it but I cant get them to lay on it for any amount of time. It's cool to the touch so I assumed they didn't like it because of the lack of padding. I put it on top of their dog bed and they still wouldn't lay on it. Maybe their just too picky... id lay on it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivey harless

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My diabetic dog loves it. We've had it for several months now and still no scratches in it as mentioned by other buyers, but our dog is a little lasa apso. I can definitely feel the coolness of it
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Tears very easily
customer_reviews.text: Had cooling mat for about 3 weeks, my 45 pound Benedoodle loved it however, I noticed a tear and liquid coming out of tear. Got the largest size, very expensive and did not last a month. Will check to see if there is some type of Warranty!
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My dogs haven’t used the cooling mat yet. However one of my cats love it and uses it all the time. One of the dogs wouldn’t use her new bed with a cooling mat for months. So, I’m sure she will use it eventually. I think this product is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: ernurse

customer_reviews.title: Great cooling mat for large dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my very large dog who used it every night and often during the day for two years. It is a great mat and I have had zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep it cool.
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepard loves this thing, we lived in hot humid Texas and this was a total life saver. Very durable. Great for over carpets and even over tile for the extra comfort. Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: This keeps our big hot Bernese Mountain Dog cool in the California heat!
customer_reviews.text: My 150 Bernese Mountain Dog loves these! At the suggestion from our vet, I purchased two Arf Pets Dog Self Cooling Mats in the largest size. California Summers are too hot for our furry love. He quickly learned this is a favorite "cool spot". We have one for each house and love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lara M.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps ripping!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother in law and it ripped. Returned it and the replacement ripped. Bought another one. He received it yesterday and it ripped today! How is his poor dog supposed to get any relief with a product that keeps ripping! Make a better product!
customer_reviews.author: Angel L Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cooling pad.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great for my large dog. He can stretch out and stay cool at the same time. Wasn't sure if it would really work, but it does. I've even used it for my back when I pulled a muscle and it worked as well as a cold compress.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry K. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT Puncture Resistant or very durable.
customer_reviews.text: +1 star for decent shipping. +1 for it being a bit cool for our dog. - 3 stars for using it once and only once and it receiving 3 punctures even though in the description it says "Durable, puncture-resistant construction". See pictures Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easily tears from dog nails.
customer_reviews.text: It should come with a lightweight cover since two days after I got it, the dog scratched a rip in it and gel chunks got in the dogs fur. The dog I got it for hasn’t quite taken to it. Now it has duck tape on the rip so we will see.
customer_reviews.author: Big Red

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: We just moved to Arizona from Colorado in the heat of the summer so I had purchased 2 of these beds for our senior hound dogs who are not use to the Arizona heat and they love them. They really do cool them down. It took our dogs a couple weeks to start to use them as they're a little slippery but once they figured out that they are nice and cool they lay on them all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: On the ranch

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Our Great Dane Tiberius has been struggling in the heat wave in Germany- consistently over 90° daily for weeks which is totally unusual. He's a big boy and his dark fur soaks up the sun and Germany is big on A/C! I was a little worried because he's so spoiled he won't lay on anything besides a bed or blanket, but once he got his paws on it and realized how cool it was, he loved it! It's definitely going to come in handy when we move to Florida too. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Less than a 1/4-inch thick, not 1-inch thick
customer_reviews.text: Less than a 1/4-inch thick, not 1-inch thick as stated in dimensions. I choose this one based on thickness. It does work for a while, but not 3 hours for a large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Must have for summer time
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and tried, wow, it’s so soft and cold to touch! Great for people who got sunburns and or feel hot all the time.
customer_reviews.author: notnew

customer_reviews.title: My dog gives it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! She may look dead in the photo but she’s zonked out! I put it in her crate. She’s 80lbs and it hasn’t torn or leaked. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Julie K.

customer_reviews.title: This pet self cooling mat did not stay cold for over an hour
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact when very hot weather it does not stay cool. I used it to cool my pets in our camper It was very little use after an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Heavier than I expected (I had not looked at the ...
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than I expected (I had not looked at the specs, just needed the mat) My aging doggie LOVES it! The large was so big that we actually fold it in half and she still has plenty of room on it. I am considering ordering one for ME to use for those hot summer nights camping (or sitting outside)!
customer_reviews.author: T&CB.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product for my old English sheepdog
customer_reviews.text: My Old English Sheepdog has his full coat at all times and loves his cooling gel pad. No matter the time of year, this breed in full coat is hot and can get deadly heat stroke within hours. My boy prefers to sleep on the cold wood or tile floors but when we got this product i’m glad he likes to sleep on it because it’s not such a hard surface as the actual floor. It cleans easily with a damp wash cloth and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: shawn

customer_reviews.title: Could of been a great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Great Pyrenees/Leonberger who is always hot! This product sounded great, and was a perfect size. Unfortunately, after two weeks a very minimal use there are already 3 tears. Her nails are trimmed regularly, not a digger, and didn't chew on it. After spending about $70, I would of thought it would of lasted a bit longer. Thank goodness for Gorilla tape.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it during the Texas summer days
customer_reviews.text: My 2 dogs love this cool mat during the summer days. It is large enough for 2 medium dogs with ease. It folds away as well, so it makes storing it in the closet an ease.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Measure to get the right size for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. Should have measured before order. Large lab could fit a smaller one. Large size makes it heavier to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Cheech

customer_reviews.title: Too delicate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last July, my dogs used it twice and we folded it up and stored it away. I just took it out and there are cuts in material all over the mat from when dogs used it those 2x. We have two 9 year old huskies that are not rough with it. I have no idea how they could have damaged it. I would have returned it, but the window for return is closed.
customer_reviews.author: amy ringsven

customer_reviews.title: Easily torn up
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even last a day? My dog isn’t even a hardcore chewer.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not cold n rips easy
customer_reviews.text: This product is not as advertised, it only stays cool for about 30 minutes and then it becomes room temperature, even warm to the touch. My dog has trimed nails, but there were rips and holes in it the very first day it was used, very cheap material. Also if your dog is double coated it will be completely ineffective. Don't buy, it is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This beds insides slide with in outer shell and make lumps that are impossible to get out
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Dogs and cats love these cooling mats
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these mats on the floor in this hot humid weather in Hawaii. The dogs and cats always lie on them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J Rea

product_meta.title: Pet Dog Self Cooling Mat Pad for Kennels, Crates and Beds 35x55
feature_bullets: Automatically Recharging Cooling Pad Provides Continuous Relief Up to 3 Hours
Versatile Mat Design Soothes & Prevents Overheating & Dehydration in the Heat
Non-Toxic, Completely Latex-Free Material is 100% Safe for Animals, Adults & Kids
Flexible Mat Folds Flat; Retains its Shape Over Time; Wipes Clean for Years of Use
Highly Durable Solid Gel Construction is Convenient for Traveling & Quick Storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
